```{r}
 students <- data.frame(
     student = c("Cecilia", "Marco", "Guangqi"),
     "GPA 2023-au" = c(4.0, 3.8, 2.8),
     check.names = FALSE)
  students

```
```{r}
 cbind(students,
      "GPA 2024-wi" = c(3.9, 3.7, 3.0))
```

```{r}
  rbind(students,
      data.frame(student = "Nong", "GPA 2023-au" = 3.6,
                 check.names = FALSE))
```
```{r}
  rbind(NULL,
       data.frame(student = "Nong", "GPA 2023-au" = 3.6,
                 check.names = FALSE))
```

```{r}
      students <- data.frame(
         name = c("Cecilia",
                  "Marco",
                  "Guangqi"),
         "GPA 2023-au" = c(4.0,
                           3.8,
                           2.8),
         check.names = FALSE)
      students

```

```{r}
   students24 <- data.frame(
         name = c("Marco",
                  "Cecilia",
                  "Guangqi"),
         "gpa 2024-wi" = c(3.7,
                           3.9,
                           3.0),
         check.names = FALSE)
      students24

```


```{r}
cbind(students, students24)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
cbind(students, students24) %>% 
  select(!name)
```

```{r}
merge(students, students24, by.x = "student", by.y = "name")
```
